attributes.action: To earn money to put into homelessness, so homeless people feel safer.
attributes.additional_details: I want the Parliament/ Government to do this because it is a very big issue that needs to be addressed. No human being should be living on the streets and struggling to eat.
attributes.background: I want the Parliament or Government to help homeless people feel safer and to easily find shelter. This can be done by giving them money to buy essentials and to get back on track.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/631032
